GK16visa06cu:701: yathā ratnāvalyām--”vāsavadatteyam” iti rājā yadā tatkaṇṭhapāśaṃ mocayati tadā taduktyā “sāgarikeyam” iti pratyabhijñāya “kathaṃ ? priyā me sāgarikā
GK16visa06cu:702: ? alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamayi ! vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśametam /

GK16visa06cu:709: tadveśena sāgarikā āyāsyatīti kṛtasaṅkete rājñi sthite tajjñātvā vāsavadattaiva sāgarikāyā āgamanāt pūrvamāgatya saṅketabhgaṃ kṛtvā rājanāṃ hrepayitvāṃ gatā /
GK16visa06cu:711: tatastadveśā sāgarikā āgatya rājānamanāsādya nirvadāllatāpāśenātmānaṃ baddhvā marttumudyatā

GK16visa06cu:714: atra vāsavadattāmaraṇarūpe 'nyasminnarthe cintite āgantukena latāpāśena vāsavadattāmaraṇacihnadyaṅkitamriyamāṇasāgarikārūpārthaprayoga iti patākasthānasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:725: atra raktādīnāṃ rudhiraśarīrārthahetukaśleṣavaśena bījārthapratipādanānnetṛmaṅgalapratipattau satyāṃ dvitāyaṃ patākāsthānam /
GK16visa06cu:731: atrānuraktādyarthe cintite śabdarūpatalliṅgo 'nyo rudhirādyartha āgantukena śabdena prayogāt patākasthānasāmānyalakṣaṇasattvam /
GK16visa06cu:732: idaṃ patākāsthānamāmukhāntargataṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca vṛttāntargataṃ bodhyam /

GK16visa06cu:744: rājā--āḥ ! kiṃ pralapasi ? kañcukī--(sabhayam) deva ! nanu bravīmi /

GK16visa06cu:754: duryodhanorubhaṅgarūpārthopakṣepakaṃ bhīmenetyatra bhīmasenarūpeṇa svānuṣṭhānayogyena ketanabhaṅgatiriktabhiprāyayuktena duryodhanasya pratyuttareṇepetam /
GK16visa06cu:759: atra ketubhaṅgarūpe 'nyasmin cintite ūrubhaṅgarūpārthaprayoga āgantukena śliṣṭaśabdenetyataḥ patākāsthānasāmānyalakṣaṇasattvam /
GK16visa06cu:769: adyodyānalatāmimāṃ samadanāṃ nārīmivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmyaham”
GK16visa06cu:771: (vi, ra) uddāmeti---rājñā parigṛhītāṃ mādhavīlatāmakālakusumitāṃ vāsavadattayāḥ parājayaśaṃsinīṃ tasyaiva darśayato rājña uktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:773: imāmudyānalatāṃ paśyannahaṃ devyā vāsavadattāyā mukhaṃ kopavipāṭaladyutiṃ kariṣyāmītyanvayaḥ
GK16visa06cu:780: śvasanasya vahirvāyorniḥ śvāsasya codramāt āyāsaṃ vyākulatāṃ khedañca ātanvatīṃ kurvatīm /
GK16visa06cu:782: (lo, ḷ) uddāmeti---udratā kalikā koraka utkaṇṭhā ca /
GK16visa06cu:788: rājñā sāgarikādarśanāt vāsavadattāyāḥ bhāvī kopo mukhyātayā pratipādya iti pradhānaṃ sūcitam
GK16visa06cu:789: atra kusumilatādarśanād bhāvini kope cintite sāgarikādarśanāt tatkopa āgantukena śliṣṭaśabdena pratipāditaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:791: etāni catvāri patākāsthānāni kvacinmaṅgalārthaṃ kvacidamaṅgalārthaṃ sarvasandhiṣu bhavanti
GK16visa06cu:793: yatpunaḥ kenaciduktam--”mukhasandhimārabhya sandhicatuṣṭaye krameṇa bhavanti” iti /
GK16visa06cu:794: tadanye na manyante, eṣāmatyantamupādeyānāmaniyamena sarvatrāpi sarveṣāmapi bhavituṃ yuktatvāt
GK16visa06cu:797: prathame marttu pravṛttavāsavadattājñānādbhilaṣitasāgarikāprāpteruddāmotkalikāmityatra bhāvinyāḥ sāgarikāprāpteśca bodhanāt maṅgalārthatā /
GK16visa06cu:798: raktaprasādhitetyādau kurūṇāṃ maraṇasya bhagnaṃ bhīmenetyādau duryodhanorubhaṅgasya ca bodhanāt teṣāmamaṅgalārthatā /
GK16visa06cu:810: rāmāderhi chadmanā vālivadhāderabhidhāne gūḍhataratadabhiprāyaparijñānānipuṇānāṃ nāṭakakāvyādibhiḥ rasāsvādamukhapiṇḍadvāreṇa kṛtyākṛtyapravṛttinivṛttiyojyānāṃ sukumāramatīnāṃ rājaputrabhṛtīnāṃ śrīrāmacandrādimahāpuruṣacaritamālocyānucitāsu kathāsu pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ
GK16visa06cu:817: vīracarite tu vālī rāmavadhārthamāgato rāmeṇa hata ityanyathā kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:819: yā ca syādvarṣaparyantaṃ kathā dinadvayādijā // VisSd_6.51 //
GK16visa06cu:832: ekadinamātrasya ca kathāyā aṅkadarśanīyatvena dinadvayādikathāyāḥ kathaṃ parigrahaḥ kathāvistāro vā rasavinghahetutvātkathamaṅke darśanīya ityata āhṛaṅkeṣviti /
GK16visa06cu:838: pūrvatra varṣaparyantatvamiha tu varṣādūrddhvatvamiti bhedānna paunaruktyam /
GK16visa06cu:845: (lo, o) nanu ekavarṣakathaiva yadyarthopakṣepeṇa vācyā tadūrddhvaṃ kathā kiṃ parityājyā ityata āha---varṣāditi /
GK16visa06cu:848: tatsarvaṃ kartavyaṃ varṣādūrdhvaṃ na tu kadācit” //
GK16visa06cu:852: sarvaṃ māsasañcitaṃ varṣasañcitaṃ vāpi kāryaṃ kṛtyam aṅkacchede 'pi
GK16visa06cu:855: evaṃ ca caturdaśavarṣavyāpinyapi rāmavanavāse ye ye virādhavadhādayaḥ
GK16visa06cu:856: kathāṃ--śāste te varṣavarṣāvayavadinayugmādīnāmekatamena sūcanīyā na viruddhāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:870: śuddhaḥ syātsa tu saṃkīrṇo nīcamadhyamakalpitaḥ // VisSd_6.56 //
GK16visa06cu:896: (lo, ā) nīcapātraprayojita ityatra nīcatvaṃ hi asaṃskṛtabhāṣitvādeva /
GK16visa06cu:906: yathā vīracarite caturthāṅkasyādau--”(nepathye) bho bho vaimānikāḥ,
GK16visa06cu:908: “rāmeṇa paraśurāmo jitaḥ” iti nepathye pātraiḥ sūcitam /
GK16visa06cu:914: aṅkānte pātraiḥ sūcitor'thādaparaḥ aṅkaḥ yadavatarati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:921: yathā---abhijñāne pañcamāṅke pātraiḥ sūcitaḥ ṣaṣṭhāṅkastadaṅkasyāṅgaviśeṣa ivāvatīrṇaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:928: aṅkāvatāre tadaṅkamātrasūcanam aṅkamukhe tu samastāṅkasūcaneti bhedaḥ
GK16visa06cu:931: yathā---mālatīmādhave prathamāṅkādau kāmandakyavalokite bhūrivasuprabhṛtīnāṃ bhāvibhūmikānāṃ parikṣiptakathāprabandhasya ca prasaṅgātsaṃniveśaṃ sūcitavatyau /
GK16visa06cu:940: pūrvalakṣaṇe pūrvapraviṣṭapātraiḥ samastāṅkārthasūcanamatra tu aṅkāntaḥ praviṣṭapātraistaduttarāṅkārthamātrasūcanamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:947: pūrvāṅkānta eva praviṣṭena sumāntrapātreṇa śatānandajanakakathāvicchede uttarāṅkamukhasūcanādaṅkāsyam” iti /
GK16visa06cu:951: (vi, cha) idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dhanikamata eva ityāha---etacceti /
GK16visa06cu:964: taṃ parityajyāmukhānantaraṃ svecchācārī bhīta evāsmi bhartturiti nīrasaṃsvabhayaṃ yaugandharāyaṇena darśitam /
GK16visa06cu:967: yadā tu sarasaṃ vastu mūlādeva pravartate // VisSd_6.62 //
GK16visa06cu:970: (vi, jha) ādāvaṅkasya darśita iti yaduktaṃ tadviṣayaṃ darśayati---yadātviti /
GK16visa06cu:973: āmukhena yaḥ pātrasyākṣepaḥ tamāśritya pravṛtta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:975: tatra hi mūlādevānasūyayā pravarttitaḥ sa rasa eva śakuntalāyā virahaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:982: tena nāyakavadhaḥ kvāpi na varṇanīyaṃ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:992: bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryameva ca // VisSd_6.64 //
GK16visa06cu:1008: yathā---ratnāvalyāmanaṅgapūjāparisamāptau kathārthavicchede sati “udayansyendorivodvīkṣate” iti sāgarikā śrutvā “(saharṣam) kadhaṃ eso so
GK16visa06cu:1013: kathaṃ sa eva udayananarendra iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1015: avāntarārthe sāgarikavirahe udayananṛpatvena jñānāt hi tasya virahavarṇanapravṛtyācchedaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1016: kintu tatsūcakaṃ vinaiva nṛpadarśanarūpakāraṇasattvāt pravarttate ityato 'ṅkāvatārādibhedaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1021: ratnāvalyāmeva dvitīyabinduryathā devīgamanānantaramevāntarāvicchede vidūṣakaṃ prati rājñā vacanam /
GK16visa06cu:1022: dhiṅamūrkha ! alaṃ parihāsena ābhijātyena gūḍho devyāstvayā na
GK16visa06cu:1024: tathā hi devīmeva prasādayituṃ gacchāva iti /
GK16visa06cu:1033: garbhe sandhau vimarśe vā nirvāhastasya jāyate /
GK16visa06cu:1037: tathā cānāyakasya sugrīvāderapi svakīyarājyalābhādiphalāntaraṃ yattadapi patākāntaramityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1038: apiśabdāt nāyakasya rāmasya setubandhādi phalāntaramapi patākāntaramiti bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:1040: garbhe vimarṣe vā sandhau ityubhayatra sandhāvityasyānvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1044: yattu muninoktam--”ā gārbhādvā vimarśādvā patākā vinivartate” //
GK16visa06cu:1047: patākā nāyakaphalaṃ nirvahaṇaparyantamapi patākāyāḥ pravṛttidarśanāt, iti vyākhyātamabhinavaguptapādaiḥ
GK16visa06cu:1052: anāyakaphalarūpā patākaiva āgarbhād āvimarṣād vā nivarttate ityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1055: anāyakasya phalāntararūpāyā eva patākāyā āgarbhād vā āvimarśādvā nivṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1056: prāsaṅgikaṃ pradeśasthaṃ caritaṃ prakarī matā // VisSd_6.68 //
GK16visa06cu:1068: naca rāvaṇasyānāyakatvāt phalaṃ tatphalakatvāt asya patākatvaprasaktiriti vācyam /
GK16visa06cu:1080: avasthāḥ pañca kāryasya prārabdhasya phalārthibhiḥ // VisSd_6.70 //
GK16visa06cu:1083: (vi, pha) asya kāryyasya pañcāvasthā āha---avasthā iti /
GK16visa06cu:1095: yathā ratnāvalyām---”tahavi ṇa atthi aṇyo daṃsaṇa uvāo tti jadhā tadhā ālihia jadhāsamīhidaṃ karaissam” /
GK16visa06cu:1098: tathāpi nāstyanyo darśanopāya itinyathā tathā ālikhya yathāsamīhitaṃ kariṣyamīti saṃskṛtam
GK16visa06cu:1113: yathā---ratnāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke veṣaparivartanābhisaraṇādeḥ saṅgamopāyādvāsavadattālakṣaṇāpāyaśaṅkayā cānirdhāritaikāntasaṅgamarūpaphalaprāptiḥ prāptyaśā /
GK16visa06cu:1127: nacāsya kathaṃ kāryāvasthātvaṃ sāgarikāsaṅgamanarūpakāryasya tenāniṣpādanāt iti vācyam /
GK16visa06cu:1158: mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho vimarśa upasaṃhṛtiḥ // VisSd_6.75 //
GK16visa06cu:1183: prathame 'ṅke iti tatra kandarpapūjāyāṃ sāgarikāyā rājño darśanaṃ
GK16visa06cu:1188: lakṣyālakṣya ivodbhedo yatra pratimukhaṃ ca tat /
GK16visa06cu:1193: vatsarājasāgarikāsamāgamahetoranurāgabījasya prathamāṅkopakṣiptasya susaṃgatā--vidūṣakābhyāṃ jñāyamānatayā kiṃcillakṣyasya vāsavadattayā citra phalakavṛttāntena kiñcidunnīyamānasyoddeśarūpa udbhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1196: sāgarikālikhitena rājñā svena ca yuktaṃ citraphalakaṃ rājñā prāptam /
GK16visa06cu:1197: vasantakahastāt skhalitaṃ vāsavadattayā tat prāpya tatra likhitasya tadubhayānurāgabījanamunnītam
GK16visa06cu:1198: tādṛśo bhedarūpaḥ pratimukhasandhiśca vāsavadattāyāmāgatāyāṃ susaṅgatāvasantakayorvyāpārarūpo yatnasahitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1207: yathā ratnāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke---”susaṃgatā---sahi, adakkhiṇā dāṇi si
GK16visa06cu:1208: tumaṃ jā evaṃ bhaṭṭiṇā hattheṇa gāhidā vi kovaṃ ṇa muñcasi” ityādau samudbhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1212: viḍhūṣakaḥ--hī hī bhoḥ, kosambīrajjalambheṇāvi ṇa tādiso piavaassassa paritoso jādiso mama saāsādo piyavaaṇaṃ suṇia bhavassadi” ityādāvudbhedaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1219: yā evaṃ bhartrā haste gṛhītāpi kopaṃ na muñcasīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1222: bho bhoḥ kauśāmbīrājyalābhenāpina tādṛśaḥ priyavayasyasya paritoṣaḥ yādṛśo mama sakāśāt priyavacanaṃ śrutvā bhaviṣyatīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1227: latāpāśakaraṇāddhi rājñaḥ sāgarikādarśanaṃ tato garbhasandheḥ prāptyāśāyogarūpāvasthāyogaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1231: yā evaṃ bhartrāhaste 'pi gṛhītāpi kopaṃ na muñcasi /
GK16visa06cu:1233: kauśāmbīrājyalābhenāpi na tādṛśaḥ priyavayasyasya paritoṣaḥ yādṛśaṃ mama sakāśāt priyavacanaṃ śrutvā bhaviṣyati /
GK16visa06cu:1236: śāpādyaiḥ sāntarāyaśca sa vimarśa iti smṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1242: yathā śākuntale caturthāṅkādau---anasūyā---piaṃvade, jaivi gandhavveṇa vivāheṇa ṇibbuttakallāṇā piasahī sauntalā aṇurūvabhattubhāiṇī saṃvutteti
GK16visa06cu:1243: nivvudaṃ me hiaam, taha vi ettiaṃ cintaṇijjam” ityata ārabhya saptamāṅkopakṣiptācchakuntalāpratyabhijñānātprāgarthasañcayaḥ śakuntalāvismaraṇarūpavinghāliṅgitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1250: “priyaṃvade ! yadyapi gāndharveṇa vivāhena nivṛttakalyāṇā priyasakhī śakuntalā anurūpabharttṛgāminī saṃvṛttā iti nirvṛtaṃ mama hṛdayam”iti
GK16visa06cu:1253: tatpūrvaṃ durvāsasaḥ śāpena rājñaḥ śakuntalāsamāgamarūpapradhānaphalasya upāyaḥ pratiruddhaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1256: smāriṣyati tvāṃ na sa bodhaito 'pi san kathāṃ pramattaḥ
GK16visa06cu:1263: priyaṃvade yadyapi gāndharveṇa vidhinā nivṛttakalyāṇā priyasakhī śakuntalā anurūpabharttṛgāminī saṃvṛtteti nivṛttaṃ me hṛdayam /
GK16visa06cu:1283: udbhadaḥ karaṇaṃ bheda etānyaṅgāni vai mukhe // VisSd_6.82 //
GK16visa06cu:1290: lābhāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ prahṛtya /
GK16visa06cu:1291: ākṛṣya pāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśān svasthā bhavanti mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ //
GK16visa06cu:1293: (vi, jha) lākṣāgṛhānaleti---”svasthā bhavantu kururājasutāḥ sabhṛtyāḥ”iti sūtradhārasyoktiṃ śrutvā praviṣṭasya bhīmasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:1294: lākṣetyādibhiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca ye 'smān prahṛtya dhārtarāṣṭrā mayi jīvati sati svasthā bhavanti ? iti /
GK16visa06cu:1296: lākṣetyādinā prāṇeṣu prahārapraveśena vittanicayeṣu ca prahāraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1301: pravṛddhaṃ yadvairaṃ mama khalu śisoreva kurubhir- na tatrāryo heturna
GK16visa06cu:1303: jarāsaṃdhasyoraḥ sthalamiva virūḍhaṃ punarapi krudhā bhīmaḥ sandhiṃ vighaṭayati yūyaṃ ghaṭayata
GK16visa06cu:1307: śiśoreveti---mama yauvanāpekṣāpi tairna kṛtā, śiśukāla eva viṣadānāt
GK16visa06cu:1322: he devi draupadi ! tava kacān keśān veṇībaddhān kurvan bhīma
GK16visa06cu:1327: suyodhanasya kīdṛśasya ? cañcatā calatā bhujena bhramitayā gadayābhighātena saṃcūrṇitamūruyugalaṃ yasya tādṛśasya /
GK16visa06cu:1330: (lo, ai) styāneti-styānaḥ san avanaddhaḥ dṛḍhībhūta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1333: parinyāsastato 'pi naścayāpattirūpatayā parito hṛdaye nyasanam, ityeṣāṃ bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1334: etāni cāṅgāni uktenaiva paurvāparyeṇa bhavanti, aṅgāntarāṇi tvanyathāpi /
GK16visa06cu:1341: yathā tatraiva---”draupadī--ṇādha, kiṃ dukkaraṃ tue parikuvideṇa” /
GK16visa06cu:1344: yattu śakuntalādiṣu “grīvābhaṅgābhirāmam---” ityādi mṛgādiguṇavarṇanaṃ tadvījārthasambandhābhāvānna saṃdhyaṅgam /
GK16visa06cu:1349: kiṃ duṣkaraṃ tvayā kupitena iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1352: atra vilāsahāsapade tajjanakapare sāropayā lakṣaṇayā prayukte /
GK16visa06cu:1362: yathā--veṇyāṃ sahādevo bhīmaṃ prati ārya ! kiṃ mahārājasaṃdeśo 'yamavyutpanna evāryeṇa gṛhītaḥ” ityataḥ prabhṛti yāvadbhīmavacanam /
GK16visa06cu:1367: yathā tatraiva---”mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopāt---” ityādi (284
GK16visa06cu:1368: pṛ.) “draupadī--(śrutvā saharṣam--) ṇādha, assudapuvvaṃ kkhu edaṃ vaaṇam,
GK16visa06cu:1373: nātha ! aśrutapūrvaṃ khalu īdṛśaṃ vacanam, tatpunaḥ punarbhaṇa iti
GK16visa06cu:1379: yathā tatraiva--”(nepathye kalakalānantaram) bho bho drupadavirāṭavṛṣṇyandhaka sahadevaprabhṛtayaḥ ! asmadakṣauhiṇīpatayaḥ kauravacamūpradhānayodhāśca śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ---
GK16visa06cu:1380: yatsatyavratabhaṅgabhīrumanasā yatnena mandīkṛtaṃ yadvismartumapīhitaṃ śamavatā śānti kulasyecchatā
GK16visa06cu:1381: taddyūtāraṇisaṃbhṛtaṃ nṛpasutākeśāmbarākarṣaṇaiḥ krodhajyotiridaṃ mahatkuruvane yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ jṛmbhate” //
GK16visa06cu:1384: yat yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ krodhajyoti iti sarvatra viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa06cu:1386: dyūtarūpāyāmaraṇyāṃ manthanakāṣṭhe nṛpasutāyā drupadasutāyā draupadyāḥ keśasyāmbarasya cākarṣaṇāt sambhṛtakrodhajyotiragniḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1388: atra “svasthā bhavantu mayi jīvati--” ityādi bījasya pradhānanāyakābhimatatvena samyagahitatvātsamādhānam
GK16visa06cu:1396: yathā vā mama prabhāvatyām--”nayanayugāsecanakam-” ityādi (236 pṛ.) /
GK16visa06cu:1407: yathā--veṇyāṃ draupadī yuddhaṃ syānna veti saṃśayānā tūryaśabdānantaram
GK16visa06cu:1408: “ṇādha ! kiṃ dāṇiṃ eso palaajalaharatthaṇidamantha khaṇe khaṇe
GK16visa06cu:1413: nātha kimidānīm eṣa pralayajaladharastanitamāṃsalaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe samaradundubhistāḍyate /
GK16visa06cu:1415: atra yuddhecchā draupadyāḥ kutūhalottarā etā vācaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1418: nātha kimidānīm eṣa pralayajaladharaḥ stanitamāṃsalaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe samaradundubhistāḍyate /
GK16visa06cu:1420: yathā tatraiva--”draupadī--aṇṇāṃ ca ṇāha, puṇovi tumhehi samarādo āacchia samāssāsaidavvā
GK16visa06cu:1432: bhaviṣyata sāmīpye varttamānā atra bhīmasya kauravavadhotpādyatāniścayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1441: yathā tatraiva---”devi ! gacchāmo vayamidānīṃ kurukulakṣayāya” iti /
GK16visa06cu:1449: vilāsaḥ parisarpaśca vidhutaṃ tāpanaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.87 //

GK16visa06cu:1670: tacchrutvāsau dayitatanayaḥ pratyayāttasya rājñaḥ śastrāṇyājau nayanasalilaṃ cāpi tulyaṃ mumoca

GK16visa06cu:2078: yathā tatraiva---bhīmaḥ--pāñcāli ! na khalu mayi jīvati saharṃttavyā duḥśāsanavilulitā veṇirātmapāṇibhyām /
GK16visa06cu:2088: yathā tatraiva, bhīmaḥ--deva ajātaśatro ! adyāpi duryodhanahatakaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2090: bhūmau kṣiptaṃ śarīraṃ nihatamidamasṛkcandanābhaṃ nijāṅge takṣmīrārye niṣaktā caturudadhipayaḥ sīmayā sārddhamurvyā /
GK16visa06cu:2091: bhṛtyā mitrāṇi yodhāḥ kurukulamanujā dagdhametadraṇāgnau nāmaikaṃ yadbravīṣi kṣitipa ! tadadhunā dhārttarāṣṭasya śeṣam //
GK16visa06cu:2096: tasya durātmano duryyodhanasya śarīraṃ mayā bhūmau kṣiptaṃ pātitam /
GK16visa06cu:2103: he kṣitipa ! dhārttarāṣṭrasya yannāma bravīṣi adhunā tadeva śeṣamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2106: yathā śākuntale--rājā ārye ! atha sā tatrabhavatī kimākhyasya rājarṣeḥ patnī ? /
GK16visa06cu:2111: parivādeti parivādenārthena kṛtaṃ vākyaṃ parivādārthakaṃ vākyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2113: śāpādhīnavismaraṇakṛtaśakuntalāparityāgasya paścāttāṃ smṛtvā tāmanāsādya virahiṇaḥ svargādāgacchatastāpasīmukhāt tatprasaṅgaṃ śrutvā duṣmantasya /
GK16visa06cu:2128: yathā tatraiva---”draupadī---visumaridaṃ edaṃ vāvāraṃ ṇādhassa pasādeṇa puṇo vi sikkhissaṃ”
GK16visa06cu:2132: vismṛtamimaṃ vyāpāraṃ nāthasya prasādena punarapi śikṣiṣye iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:2141: iyaṃ sāgarikāyāḥ mātulakanyakātvena paricaye sati vāsavadattāyā uktiḥ
GK16visa06cu:2144: yathā mama prabhāvatyāṃ nāradadarśanāt pradyumna ūrddhvamavalokya---
GK16visa06cu:2146: digantaṃ jyotibhistuhinakaragaurairdhavalayannitaḥ kailāsādriḥ patati viyataḥ kiṃ punaridam
GK16visa06cu:2152: tathā ca kailāsādrerapeto viyato viyato 'vadheḥ patati kaścit padārtha iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2156: mālāṃ kīdṛśī ? parimalena tata ito bhramantīnāṃ bhṛṅgaśreṇīnāṃ dhvanibhirupagītām /
GK16visa06cu:2167: lakṣaṇam, tatra dātureva sāmaprītirarthaśca dhanamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2175: bhānumatī duryyodhanasya patnī tathā dāsīdvārā prāk kaṭūktiḥ kṛtā /
GK16visa06cu:2187: rājānaḥ sutanirviśeṣamadhunā paśyantu nityaṃ prajā jīyasuḥ sadasadvivekapaṭavaḥ santo guṇagrāhiṇaḥ sasyasvarṇasamṛddhayaḥ samadhikāḥ santu kṣamāmaṇḍale bhūyādavyabhicāriṇī trijagato bhaktiśca nārāyaṇo //
GK16visa06cu:2193: adhunā sutanirviśeṣaṃ yathā syāt tathā rājānaḥ prajāḥ paśyantu /
GK16visa06cu:2194: guṇagrāhiṇaḥ santaḥ śiṣṭā jīyāsuḥ utkarṣabhājo bhavantu, yataste sadasadvivekapaṭavaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2195: kṣamāmaṇḍale śasyānāṃ suvarṇānāñca samṛddhayaḥ samadhikāḥ santu /
GK16visa06cu:2196: nārāyaṇe cāvyabhicāriṇī akādācitkī bhaktiḥ trijagatāṃ bhūyāditi nṛpadeśādiśāntiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2199: “iha ca mukhasaṃdhau upakṣepaparinyāsayuktyudbhedasamādhānānāṃ pratimukhe ca parisarpaṇapragamanavajropanyāsapuṣpāṇāṃ garbhe 'bhūtāharaṇamargatro
GK16visa06cu:2202: anyeṣāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ sthitiḥ” iti kecit /
GK16visa06cu:2204: (vi, ya) sandhiṣu yānyaṅgānyuktāni teṣu katicit aṅgānyeva āvaśyakatvena pradhānānīti kecidāhuḥ
GK16visa06cu:2223: aniyate sandhavapi tasyāṅgasya niveśanaṃ kuryyāt ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2242: prakāśyānāmarthānāṃ prakāśanañceti prayogasya mukhasandhyādiprayogasya aṅgānāmupakṣepādyaṅgānāṃ ṣaṭ phalānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2243: yathā kāvyārthetpattirūpasya upakṣeparūpasya mukhasandhyaṅgasya iṣṭānusaraṇaṃ phalam /
GK16visa06cu:2246: (lo, ī) yadvastu gopayitumiṣṭaṃ tadaṅgasvarūpavijñāpanena sukhena gopayitu evaṃ prakāśyānāṃ prakāśaścetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2248: aṅgahīnaṃ tathā kāvyaṃ na prayogāya yujyate // VisSd_6.118 //
GK16visa06cu:2259: atra ca tatsambandhāt nāyakasahāya eva tattvenoktaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2266: (vi, śa) upakṣepādyaṅgatrayasya ca pradhānanāyaketareṇa samuddiṣṭatve eva sādhutā ityāha--kintūpakṣepeti
GK16visa06cu:2269: pradhānapuruṣasya dhīrodāttatvena karttavyetivṛttabījasamuddeśasya alpasyāpi tena karaṇānaucityād iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2270: tathā hi kāvyārthasya samutpattirūpaṃ yadupakṣeparūpamaṅgaṃ tena veṇyāṃ lākṣāgṛhānaletyādi bhīmoktyā kurukulavadharūpakāvyārthasya tasya bījasamutpattiḥ pratipāditā /
GK16visa06cu:2272: yadvairaṃ mama'; ityādi bhīmoktyā tad bāhulyaṃ pratipāditam /
GK16visa06cu:2278: bījoddeśamātrādeva nāyakasya dhīrodāttatvabhaṅga ityatra eva tātparyyāt /
GK16visa06cu:2281: tathā ca yadveṇyāṃ duryodhanasya bhānumatyā saha vipralambho darśitaḥ,
GK16visa06cu:2287: kintu rasavyañjanāpekṣayā eva eṣāṃ niveśanaṃ na tu nāṭyasāstroktasthitisampādanecchayā ityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2288: yadyapīdaṃ prāgapyuktaṃ tathāpi rasavyaktyanapekṣayā karaṇe doṣa tvapratipādanāya purarūktam
GK16visa06cu:2300: svasyopakrāntavṛttasya viruddhamadhikaṃ yad vṛttaṃ vṛttāntaḥ tadapi rasābhivyaktaye 'nyathayedupakrāntarasāviruddhatayā pratipādayet /
GK16visa06cu:2304: rase raudre ca bībhatse vṛttiḥ sarvatra bhāratī // VisSd_6.122 //
GK16visa06cu:2310: nāyakādīnāṃ vyāpāraviśeṣāścatastro vṛttayo nāṭakādiṣu nāṭakaprakaraṇādidaśarūpakeṣu nāṭikādyaṣṭādaśoparūpakeṣu ca sarvanāṭyasya mātṛkā mūlabhūtāḥ jananya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2319: (lo, u) kāmena madanena hetunā ya upabhogaḥ sambhogastatkāraṇāni
GK16visa06cu:2341: śuddhena saśṛṅgāreṇa samayena ca hāsyena vihitamiti traividhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2344: ratnāvalyām---”vāsavadattā--(phalakamuddiśya sahāsam) esā vi avarā tava samīve jadhālihidā edaṃ kiṃ ajjavasantassa viṇṇāṇam /
GK16visa06cu:2347: eṣāpyaparā tava samīpe yā ālikhitā etat kimāryavasantakasya vijñānam ? (saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:2348: citraphalake sāgarikayā likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṅgatayā tatsamīpe sāgarikāpi likhitā /
GK16visa06cu:2349: tatra likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavadattayā pṛṣṭaṃ kena tvamatra likhitā iti /
GK16visa06cu:2351: tatastadantike sāgarikāṃ likhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā “eṣā krodhena tasyāḥ śṛṅgārābhāvāt /
GK16visa06cu:2353: saśṛṅgārahāsyena yathā śākuntale--rājānaṃ prati śakuntalā--asaṃtuṭṭho uṇa kiṃ karissadi /
GK16visa06cu:2359: asaṃtuṣṭaḥ punaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati ? iti (saṃskṛtam) nanu kamalasya madhukaraḥ santuṣyati gandhamātreṇa iti rājña uktyanantaraṃ śakuntalāyā iyaṃ pṛcchā /
GK16visa06cu:2371: atra rājño bhītiyuktena susaṅgatāyā hāsena vihitaṃ narma vaidaghdhyakrīḍitam /
GK16visa06cu:2375: tatra sāgarikāyāḥ saṅketabhaṅgārthaṃ tadveśāyā vāsavadattāyā āgamane veśena bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2379: visṛja sundari ! saṅgamasādhvasaṃ nanu cirātprabhṛti praṇayonmukhe /
GK16visa06cu:2381: mālavikā--”bhaṭṭā, devīe bhaeṇa appaṇo vi pia kauṃ ṇa pāremi” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2389: nanu bhościrāt praṇayonmukhe mayi atimuktalatāyāḥ mādhavīlatāyāścaritaṃ gṛhāṇa /
GK16visa06cu:2390: mayi kīdṛśe ? sahakāratāṃ cūtavṛkṣatāṃ gate, mādhavikayā
GK16visa06cu:2393: he bharttaḥ ! devyāḥ bhayena ātmano 'pi priyaṃ karttuṃ na pārayāmi
GK16visa06cu:2400: gamanamalasaṃ śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ śarīramasauṣṭhavaṃ śvasitamadhikaṃ kintvetat syāt kimadanyadito 'thavā /
GK16visa06cu:2401: bhramati bhuvane kandarpājñā vikāri ca yauvanaṃ lalitamadhurāste te bhāvāḥ kṣipanti ca dhīratām
GK16visa06cu:2407: alasagamanādikam etat kinnu tasyāḥ, nanu bhoḥ kiṃ syāt ito 'nyat,
GK16visa06cu:2412: atrottarottarādhikādhikasambhāvanāyāṃ pūrvoktaiḥ sūcitasya bhāvasya leśa evetyāha---alasetyādi
GK16visa06cu:2424: pitrā rājājñayā jarate nandanāya dātuṃ kṛtaniścayā mālatīti devatagṛhe svamaraṇaṃ prārthayantī lavaṅgikāyāḥ pāde patitā mālatī /
GK16visa06cu:2425: stambhantaritasthito mādhavaśca lavaṅgikāveśena āgatya lavaṅgikām apasārya tatsthāne svapādaṃ dattvā sthitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2426: tato mālatī utthāyā lavaṅgikābuddhyā tamāliṅgya paścād dṛṣṭvā paricīyamānā vyavasāyat nivavṛte ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2434: sattvādibhiḥ samastavyastālpatarair bahulā tadvaiśiṣṭyāt bāhulyavatī harṣādyanyatarayuktā vṛttiśca sāttvatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2437: atra kṣudraśṛṅgāratvena strīsaṃkulatvakāmopabogarāhityena vīrarasatvena kauśikīto viśeṣaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2443: ānandāya ca vismayāya ca mayā dṛṣṭo 'si duḥkhāya vā vaitṛṣṇyantu mamāpi samprati kutastvaddarśane cakṣuṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2444: tvatsāṅgatyasukhasya nāsmi viṣayastat kiṃ vṛthā vyāhṛtaiḥ ? asmin viśrutajāmadagnyadamane pāṇau dhanurjṛnbhatām //
GK16visa06cu:2446: (vi, ṭha) ānandāya ceti---paraśurāmāgame rāmaṃ prati janakasya
GK16visa06cu:2451: ato 'dya tvaddarśane samprati etat kṣaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ kuto vaitṛṣṇayam /
GK16visa06cu:2452: utkaṇṭhābāhulyāt kṣaṇāntare 'niṣṭanivṛttau tu utkaṇṭhānivṛttyā vaitṛṣṇyaṃ syāditi samprati padabhāvārthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2453: bahuvyāhṛtairvā kiṃ, yato vaivāhikamāṅgalyasukhasya na viṣayo 'smi /
GK16visa06cu:2454: ato 'smin viṃsmṛtasya jāmadagnyasya vijayanimittaṃ tava bāhau dhanurjṛmbhatāmityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2456: atra vismayavaśād rāmaśauryyeṇānandādinā ca vaiśiṣṭyaṃ vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2464: mantrasya mantraṇārthasya dhanasya daivasyādṛṣṭasya vā śakteḥ śaktihetoḥ saṃghasya sainyasamūhasya bhedanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2465: rākṣasaḥ śatrumantrī; cāṇakyo rājamantrī; svabuddhyā svamantraṇayā /
GK16visa06cu:2466: atra cāṇakyasya sattvadānānekasattvaṃ saṃghabhedanavaśād vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2468: yathā vīracarite---”rāmaḥ--ayaṃ saḥ, yaḥ kila saparivārakārttikeyavijayāvajītena bhagavatā
GK16visa06cu:2470: paraśurāmaḥ--rāma dāśarathe ! sa evāyamāryapādānāṃ priyaḥ paraśuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2476: atra kautukeneva vijayo na tu vāstava iti tatpitṛprasādagamyam /
GK16visa06cu:2477: tathāparaprasādalabdhena paraśunā ko 'yaṃ garva iti rāmasya
GK16visa06cu:2479: paraśurāmoktau tatpriyavastvapi mahyaṃ dattamiti svamahattvakhyāpanameva gabhīratā /
GK16visa06cu:2504: jīyante jayino 'pi sāndratimiravrātairviyadvyāpibhir- bhāsvantaḥ sakalā raverapi karāḥ kasmādakasmādamī /
GK16visa06cu:2512: raverapi amī bhāsvantaḥ sakalāḥ karāḥ akasmādakāle kasmādacchādyante
GK16visa06cu:2514: ānanarūpābhyaḥ kandarābhyo 'nalamuca ete pheravāḥ śṛgālāśca tīvrān ravān muñcantītyarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2523: kruddhau ca tau satvarau ceti karmadhārayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2535: neturnṛtyapātrasya ekasya nivṛttau netrantarasya graha eva saṃkṣiptavasturacanā /
GK16visa06cu:2544: eva sugrīvakilañjahastinoḥ pūrvaṃ raudro raso bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2555: yathā kṛtyarāvaṇo ṣaṣṭhe 'ṅke--”(praviśya khaṅgahastaḥ puruṣaḥ)” ityataḥ prabhṛti niṣkramaṇaparyantam
GK16visa06cu:2564: aśrāvya khalu yadvastu tadiha svagataṃ matam // VisSd_6.137 //
GK16visa06cu:2566: rahasyaṃ tu yadanyasya parāvṛtya prakāśyate // VisSd_6.138 //
GK16visa06cu:2576: tādṛśena kareṇānyamapavāryyācchādya janasyānte antike yat anyonyāmantraṇaṃ kathanaṃ, tajjanāntikamityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2577: kiṃ vravīṣīti yannāṭye vinā pātraṃ prayujyate /
GK16visa06cu:2579: yaḥ kaścidartho yasmādropanīyastasyāntarata ūrdhvaṃ sarvāṅgulināmitānāmikaṃ tripatākalakṣaṇaṃ karaṃ kṛtvānyena saha yanmantryate tajjanāntikam /
GK16visa06cu:2591: dattāṃ siddhāṃ ca senāṃ ca veśyānāṃ nāma darśayet /
GK16visa06cu:2596: vasantādiṣu varṇanīyasya vastuno yannāma bhavet ceṭaceṭyostathā nāma ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2604: nāṭake garbhitaḥ pratipādyo yor'thastatprakāśakaṃ nāṭakasya nāma kāryyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2616: (vi, ra) nāṭikādīnyaṣṭādaśoparūpakāṇi yānyuktani teṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nāma kābhirnāyikānāmnaivetyarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2622: tadantaḥ sādhadhātuḥ gameḥ sthāne prāyeṇa prayujyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2625: rājā svamīti deveti bhṛtyairbhaṭṭeti cādhamaiḥ // VisSd_6.144 //
GK16visa06cu:2632: (lo, ū) apatyapratyayena yathā--he rāghava ! he dāśarathe ! ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2636: sa rājā ṛṣibhiḥ rājannati apatyapratyayena ca vācya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2640: vayasyetyathavā nāmnā vācyo rājñā viḍhūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.146 //
GK16visa06cu:2644: vidūṣako rājñā vayasyeti vācyaḥ, athavā nāmnaiva iti /
GK16visa06cu:2650: sūtradhāraṃ vadedbhāva iti vai pāripārśivakaḥ // VisSd_6.147 //
GK16visa06cu:2663: devarṣayo liṅginaḥ parivrājakāśca sarvaireva bhagavanniti vācyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2664: vadedrājñīṃ ca ceṭīṃ ca bhavatīti vidūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.149 //
GK16visa06cu:2665: āyuṣman rathinaṃ sūto vṛddhaṃ tāteti cetaraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2667: (vi, ka) rathinaṃ vṛddhasūta āyuṣmanniti itarastu tāteti vadedityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2668: vatsaputrakatāteti nāmnā gotreṇa vā sutaḥ // VisSd_6.150 //
GK16visa06cu:2670: (lo, ṛ) gotreṇa yathā--he kauśika ! he ātreya ! ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2676: sādho ! iti tapasvī ca praśāntaścocyate budhaiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2688: vācyā prakṛtibhī rājñaḥ kumārī bhartṛdārikā // VisSd_6.154 //
GK16visa06cu:2692: jyeṣṭha uttamastathā cottamamadhyamādhamaiḥ svastriyaḥ strībhiḥ patiryathā tathā vācya ityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2693: tathā cāryyaputreti patyurucyamānatvāt āryyaiti patyā striyo vācyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2698: haleti sadṛśī, preṣyā hañje veśyājjukā tathā // VisSd_6.155 //
GK16visa06cu:2707: (lo, ḷ) he cārvāka ! he kolikeya ! ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2712: yasya yatkarma śilpaṃ vā vidyā vā jātireva vā // VisSd_6.157 //
GK16visa06cu:2722: śaurasenyādayo bahvyo bhāṣāḥ prākṛtaviśeṣāḥ prākṛtavṛttau anusandheyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2723: āsāmeva tu gāthāsu mahārāṣṭrīṃ prayojayet // VisSd_6.159 //
GK16visa06cu:2774: atra nāṭakalakṣaṇāni sakalāni ṣaṭtriṃśaddharmāṇi prayojyāni ityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2776: trayodaśa vīthyaṅgāni, da śa lāsyāṅgāni yathālābhaṃ prayojyāni /
GK16visa06cu:2783: nidarśanābhiprāyau ca prāptirvicāra eva ca // VisSd_6.172 //
GK16visa06cu:2787: pṛcchā prasiddhiḥ sārūpyaṃ saṃkṣepo guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.174 //
GK16visa06cu:2802: koṣaḥ kuṅbhavā evā ko ṣo dhanam /
GK16visa06cu:2829: kāmaṃ dhanuriva krūro varjanīyaḥ satāṃ prabhuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2832: dhanuriva krūraḥ prabhuḥ kāma yatheṣṭaṃ satāṃ varjanīyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2837: koṭi koṭisaṃkhyakaṃ dhanaṃ dadāti tathākoṭyādyatiguṇo jyā śauryādiśca
GK16visa06cu:2838: atra siddhena dhanuṣā samaṃ prasiddhaḥ krūraḥ prabhuḥ vidheyavarjanānvayārthaṃ prakāśyate
GK16visa06cu:2854: anuyāntyā janātītaṃ kāntaṃ sādhu tvayā kṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:2855: kā dinaśrīrvinārkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā //

GK16visa06cu:3463: na ca pūrvasiddhārthakathanātmakaṃ yat niruktirūpaṃ nāṭyalakṣaṇamuktaṃ tadbheda iti vācyam

GK16visa06cu:3469: he mṛgākṣi ! rākṣasapateḥ rāvaṇasya kaṇṭhāṭavī kenāpyatra kṛttā arthāt mayā /

GK16visa06cu:3482: tatkṣamasva vibho ! kiṃ ca sugrīvaste samarpitaḥ //
GK16visa06cu:3495: yathā veṇyām---”rājā---kañcukin ! devasya devakīnandanasya bahumānādvatsasya bhīmasenasya vijayamaṅgalāya pravartantāṃ tatrocitāḥ samārambhāḥ” /
GK16visa06cu:3501: kāryasya sambandhai yat sādhuno maṅgalasya pravarttanaṃ tat ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3503: tena bhūtakāryyākhyānarūpāt utkīrttanālaṅkārāt bhedaḥ deśaḥ so
GK16visa06cu:3508: yadi samaramapāsya nāsti mṛtyorbhayamiti yuktamito 'nyataḥ prayātum /
GK16visa06cu:3509: akha maraṇamavaśyameva jantoḥ kimiti mudhā malinaṃ yaśaḥ kurudhvam ? //
GK16visa06cu:3514: droṇasya maraṇena palāyamānān vīrān prati aśvatthāmna uktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:3521: yathā tatraiva--”sahi, ṇa juttaṃ assamavāsiṇo jaṇassa akidasakkāraṃ adidhivisesaṃ ujjhia sacchandado gamaṇam” /
GK16visa06cu:3527: eṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇanāṭyālaṅkārāṇāṃ sāmānyata ekarūpatve 'pi bhedena vyapadeśo gaḍḍalikāpravāheṇa
GK16visa06cu:3534: etāni lakṣaṇāni, etā alaṅkṛtaya ityevaṃ bhedena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3537: (lo, i) gaḍḍarikāpravāheṇeti---yathā gaḍḍarikā ekā aparāṃ tāṃ
GK16visa06cu:3538: caṃtarānugacchati, tāsāṃ gatānugatamātreṇa bhedaḥ tathā lakṣaṇanāṭyālaṅkārayorapīti bhāvaḥ
GK16visa06cu:3542: keṣāñcit vakṣyamāṇopamāvyatirekālaṅkārādirūpatvena teṣu kāvyāṅgeṣu keṣāñcicca guṇabhāvatatsamvandhivyañjakatvena teṣu kāvyāṅgeṣu antarbhāvasambhave 'pi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3543: prayatnataḥ karttavyatvāditi---karttavyatā ca tattaprasaṅgaucityānusāreṇa yathāyogyameva na tu sarvatraiva
GK16visa06cu:3556: (vi, la) sukavinā tu etat sakalaviśiṣṭamapi naṭakaṃ karttyamiti
GK16visa06cu:3563: “trayastriṃśat prayojyāni vīthyaṅgāni trayodaśa'; ityuktatvāt trayastriṃśadalaṅkāroktyanantaraṃ vīthyaṅgānāṃ vaktavyatve prāpte vīthirūpakanāṭakaviśeṣasya viśipya darśitatvāt darśayiṣyamāṇatadavasare vīthyaṅgāni vakṣyante ityāha---vīthyaṅgānīti /
GK16visa06cu:3581: tantrībhāṇḍam tantryāśrayāṃ vīṇāṃ puraskṛtya pradhānīkṛtya śuṣkaṃ gānaṃ nṛtyahīnagānam /
GK16visa06cu:3584: madanottāpitā yatra paṭhati prākṛtaṃ sthitā // VisSd_6.215 //
GK16visa06cu:3599: (lo, ū) viparyāsaceṣṭitaṃ striyāḥ puruṣasya coṣṭitaṃ, paruṣasya strīceṣṭitam /
GK16visa06cu:3601: vīṇāpuraḥsaraṃ gānaṃ striyāḥ pracchedako mataḥ // VisSd_6.218 //
GK16visa06cu:3613: prākṛtaṃ vacanaṃ vaktiṃ yatra tatsaindhavaṃ matam /
GK16visa06cu:3649: (lo, ṝ) evaṃ naṭakalakṣaṇaṃ gobalīvardanyāyena bhinnaṃ mahānāṭakalakṣaṇam /
GK16visa06cu:3658: laukikaṃ na tu divyaṃ miśraṃ vā /
GK16visa06cu:3670: śṛṅgāritvena kadāciddharmasya nāyikāyā mānāt kadācitkāmasya kāmārthavyavasāyāt arthasya cāpāyavānityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:3675: nāyikā kulajā kvāpi veśyā kvāpi dvayaṃ kvacit /
GK16visa06cu:3680: tasya prakaraṇasya kulajā veśyā tadubhayanāyikābhedāt bhedakṣatrayam
GK16visa06cu:3688: ekāṅka eka evātra nipuṇaḥ paṇḍito viṭaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3693: mukhanivahaṇo sandhī lāsyāṅgāni daśāpi ca // VisSd_6.230 //
GK16visa06cu:3697: nāṭakasyāntarātmā nāyakaḥ sa nānāvastho yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3758: sa cācetanaiḥ kāṣṭhaputtalikādibhiścetanaiḥ prahasanakaraiścetanācetanaiścetanatve 'pi prakṛṣṭacetanārahitaiḥ paśvādibhiḥ tadvakṣyati /
GK16visa06cu:3769: (vi, ṭha) tatra nāyikānāyakayoḥ arthalābhārthaḥ śṛṅgāro veśyānāṃ;
GK16visa06cu:3773: (lo, o) prahasano hāsyayuktaḥ prathamoddiṣṭo 'pi dharmaśṛṅgāraḥ paścād vidheyatvena paścād vyākhyātaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3774: aniyamāditi kvaciddivyaḥ kvacinnaro vā nāyakaḥ arthaprakṛtayaḥ ārambhayatnādyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3794: mukhapratimukhe sandhī tatra nirvahaṇaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.245 //
GK16visa06cu:3801: narau vā divyau vā naradivyau vā nāyakapratināyakāvityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3809: mahādhmāno vadhaprāptā api vadhyāḥ syuratra no /
GK16visa06cu:3814: tathā ca nāyakapratināyakau dvau, patākānāyakā daśa iti dvādhaśā /
GK16visa06cu:3815: yuddhamiti yuddharūpaṃ saṃrambhaṃ vikramaṃ parabalamānīya prāpayya vyājāt nivarttayet ityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:3819: ekāṅko deva evātra netetyāhuḥ pare punaḥ // VisSd_6.249 //
GK16visa06cu:3828: anye tu ṣaḍnāyakamāhurityāha--ekāṅko divya ityādi ca /
GK16visa06cu:3829: patākānāyaka ityādikaṃ vyācaṣṭai---patākāsthā iti nāyakapratināyakayoḥ sambandhinaḥ patākāsthā nāyakā militāḥ saṅgatā daśa ityarthaḥ īhāmṛgavyutpattimāha---nāyako mṛgavaditi /
GK16visa06cu:3831: utsṛṣṭikāṅka ekāṅko netāraḥ prākṛtā narāḥ // VisSd_6.250 //
GK16visa06cu:3835: yuddhaṃ ca vācā karttavyaṃ nirvadavacanaṃ bahu // VisSd_6.252 //
GK16visa06cu:3844: asya ca ekāṅkatvena aṅkāntarotsaṅkāt amum utsṛṣṭikāṅkanāmānaṃ kecidāhurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3845: anye tu vakṣyamāṇavīthyāmapi ekāṅkasattvāt tasyā api utsṛṣṭikāṅkatvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3856: arthaprakṛtaya iti bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryyameva iti yāḥ pañca prakṛtayaḥ prāguktāstā ākhilā api atretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3861: kauśikyā vṛtteratra anuktatve 'pi bhūriśṛṅgāravattvāt tallābha ityāha--śṛṅgārabahulatvāditi
GK16visa06cu:3865: asatpralāpavyāhāramṛda(mārda) vāni ca tāni tu // VisSd_6.256 //
GK16visa06cu:3876: (vi, pa) prapañcākhyamaṅgamāha---mitha iti--asadbhūtam alīkārtham ata eva hāsyakṛt /
GK16visa06cu:3887: rāmā ramye vanānte 'smin mayā virahitā tvayā //
GK16visa06cu:3893: mayā virahitā sarvāṅgasundarī rāmā urvaśī ramye 'smin vanānte tvayā dṛṣṭā iti praśnaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3894: kathaṃ dṛṣṭā ityāhatvayā virahitā mayā dṛṣṭeti pratiśabdārthasya yojanāddarśanottaraṇaśabdayorekārthatve 'pi darśitarītyā praśrottarabhāvena yojanādanekārthatā, tad vyācaṣṭe---atra praśreti /
GK16visa06cu:3899: mayā virahitā tvayā dṛṣṭā; pakṣe tvayā virahitā mayā dṛṣṭā /
GK16visa06cu:3900: atra rājñāṃ prathamārthābhiprāyeṇa praśrarūpārthaṃ vākyamidamuktvā parvate pratidhvanimākarṇya dvitīyārthaḥ parvatasyottaratvenāvagato virahonmādāta /
GK16visa06cu:3903: kartā dyūtacchalānāṃ, jatumayaśaraṇoddīpanaḥ so 'bhimānī rājā duḥśāsanādergururanujaśatasyāṅgarājasya mitram /
GK16visa06cu:3904: kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanapaṭuḥ pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ kvā'ste duryodhano
GK16visa06cu:3910: dyūtacchalādikarttṛtvaviśiṣṭo yastaṃ draṣṭumāgatau svaḥ na tu ruṣā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3914: atra draṣṭumeva na ruṣeti priyābhena vākyena pratārya upahasanam /
GK16visa06cu:3926: bhikṣo ! māṃsaniṣevaṇaṃ prakuruṣe, kiṃ tena madyaṃ vinā madyaṃ cāpi tava priyaṃ priyamaho vārāṅganābhiḥ saha /
GK16visa06cu:3927: veśyāpyartharuciḥ kutastava dhanaṃ dyūtena cauryeṇa vā cauryadyūtaparigraho 'pi bhavato, naṣṭasya kānyā gatiḥ //
GK16visa06cu:3930: parihāsāya māṃsaṃ bhakṣantaṃ bhikṣuṃ prati bhikṣo ityādirgṛhiṇaḥ praśraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3955: adya mama pracaṇḍe bhujadaṇḍe samarpito ya uruḥ kodaṇḍastato nirgalitānāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ bāṇaānāṃ samūhasya (sahastrasya vā pāṭhabhedāt )
GK16visa06cu:3956: pātairiyaṃ kṣauṇī kṣaṇena samastadaityakṣatajaiḥ ukṣitā satī piśitāśanānāṃ lobhanīya āstāmityanvayaḥ
GK16visa06cu:3957: gaṇḍaṃ prastutasaṃbandhi bhinnārthaṃ satvaraṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.260 //
GK16visa06cu:3959: adhyāsituṃ tava cirājjaghanasthalasya paryāptameva karabhoru ! mamorugmam
GK16visa06cu:3964: satvareṇoktatvāt satvaraṃ bhinnārthaṃ vaco yat prastutasya prakrāntasya varṇanaṃ tat sambandhitayā pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3972: yathā chilitarāme--sītā-jāda ! kāllaṃ kkhu aojjhāeṇa gantavvam, tarhi so rāā viṇaeṇa paṇayidavvo
GK16visa06cu:3976: sītā--(sāśaṅkam) mā aṇṇadhā saṅkaddham, ṇa kkhu tumhāṇaṃ saalāe jjeva puhavīetti /
GK16visa06cu:3979: svarasoktasya vaktṛbhāvena utkasya śroturasvarasāt yadanyathā vyākhyānaṃ tadavasyanditamityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:3982: tatra sa rājā vinayena praṇamitavyaḥ (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:3984: jātaḥ sa khalu yuvayoḥ pitā (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:3987: mā aṇṇadhā iti, mā anyathā śaṅkethām /
GK16visa06cu:3988: na khalu yuvayoḥ kiṃ tu sakalāyā eva pṛthivyā iti (iti saṃskṛtam)
GK16visa06cu:3990: atrapiteti janakaparatayā sītayā svarasoktasya labdhāvasyandanāt tayā eva pālakatayā vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:3991: prahelikaiva hāsyena yuktā bhavati nālikā // VisSd_6.261 //
GK16visa06cu:3993: yathā ratnāvalyām---susaṅgatā---sahi jassa kide tumaṃ āadā so ida jjeva ciṭṭhadi /
GK16visa06cu:3994: sāgarikā--kassa kide ahaṃ āadā susaṅgatā--ṇaṃ kkhu cittaphalaassa /
GK16visa06cu:3995: atra tvaṃ rājñaḥ kṛte āgatetyarthaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4000: sahi jasseti---sakhi yasya kṛte tvamāgatā so 'traiva tiṣṭhatīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:4002: kasya kṛte ahamāgatā (iti saṃskṛtam) ṇaṃ citteti /
GK16visa06cu:4005: agṛhṇato 'pi mūrkhasya puro yacca hitaṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.262 //
GK16visa06cu:4020: kaiva prabhāvatī kīdṛśī ? alikulam eva mañjulāḥ keśaā yasyāstādṛśī,
GK16visa06cu:4026: atra ca āhāryāropābhāvāt na rūpakaṃ kintu vāstavabhramāt bhrāntimadalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa06cu:4028: tatra yathā mama-- dvijaḥ śākhāyuktastvayi kṛtakathaḥ kokila iti tvayākhyeyaṃ mande mayi virahipāte kiyadagham /
GK16visa06cu:4029: iti praśre vāyormukulapulakā cūtalatikā dhruvaṃ dhṛtvā mauliṃ na khalu kiyadityuttarayati
GK16visa06cu:4030: atra hi vātadhūtamaulikāyāṃ cūtalatikāyāṃ mandavayoḥ kati māpapraśre maulipūnanena pāpabhāvottarāropaḥ
GK16visa06cu:4034: kokila eva drupadāmantrasya ṛṣiḥ kokilanāma vedaśākhāyukto dvijaḥ sa tvayi kṛtakatha ityatastvayā mande vedarahite idamapyākhyeyam /
GK16visa06cu:4038: tṛtīyaṃ yathā veṇyāṃ duryodhanaṃ prati gāndhāryā hitavākyam /
GK16visa06cu:4039: athavā pradīyatāṃ dāśarathaye maithilīti rāvaṇaṃ prati vibhīṣaṇasya vākyamidamapi bodhyam
GK16visa06cu:4043: (ityupakrameṇa) gaṇadāsaḥ--(vidūṣakaṃ prati---) ārya ! ucyatāṃ yastvayā kramabhedo lakṣitaḥ
GK16visa06cu:4044: vidūṣakaḥ--paḍhamaṃ bambhaṇapūā bhodi, sā imāe laṅghidā /
GK16visa06cu:4055: prathamaṃ brāhmaṇapūjā bhavati sā anayā laṅghitā /
GK16visa06cu:4057: atra parasya lājño lābhārthaṃ hāsyakaraṃ vidūṣakasya vākyamāha--
GK16visa06cu:4058: doṣā guṇā guṇā doṣā yatra syurmṛdar(mādaṃ)vaṃ hi tat // VisSd_6.263 //
GK16visa06cu:4064: etāni cāṅgani nāṭakādiṣu sambhavantyapi vīthyāmavaśyaṃ vidheyāni spaṣṭatayā nāṭakādiṣu viniviṣṭānyapīhodāhṛtāni
GK16visa06cu:4071: aṅgī hāsyarasastatra vīthyaṅgānāṃ sthitirna vā // VisSd_6.265 //
GK16visa06cu:4076: āśritya kañcana janaṃ saṃkīrṇamiti tadviduḥ // VisSd_6.266 //
GK16visa06cu:4087: idaṃ tu saṅkīrṇenaiva gatārthamiti muninā pṛthaṅnoktam /
GK16visa06cu:4089: tatra nāṭikā kḷptavṛttā syāt strīprāyā caturaṅkikā /
GK16visa06cu:4095: pade pade mānavatī tadvaśaḥ saṅgamo dvayoḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4096: vṛttiḥ syātkauśikī svalpavimarśāḥ sandhayaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.272 //
GK16visa06cu:4101: troṭakaṃ nāma tatprāhuḥ pratyaṅkaṃ savidūṣakam // VisSd_6.273 //
GK16visa06cu:4113: na ca viṣkambhako 'pyatra pracuraścādbhuto rasaḥ // VisSd_6.276 //
GK16visa06cu:4130: dāsī ca nāyikā vṛttiḥ kauśikī bhāratī tathā // VisSd_6.280 //
GK16visa06cu:4138: catastro nāyikāstatra trayo 'ṅkā iti kecana // VisSd_6.283 //
GK16visa06cu:4149: netā strī cāpyudāttātra sandhī ādyo tathāntimaḥ // VisSd_6.285 //
GK16visa06cu:4158: nepathye gīyate nāndī tathā tatra prarocanā // VisSd_6.287 //
GK16visa06cu:4167: hīnairbhāṣyā vibhāṣā syāt sā ca saptavidhā smṛtā /
GK16visa06cu:4168: prācyāvantī māgadhī ca śākārī ca tathāparā /
GK16visa06cu:4169: cāṇḍālī śāvarī caiva tathā bhīrīti bhedataḥ //
GK16visa06cu:4179: na tatra vṛttirbhavati bhāratī na ca kauśikī // VisSd_6.292 //
GK16visa06cu:4198: aśāntahāsyāśca rasā nāyako brāhmaṇo mataḥ // VisSd_6.296 //
GK16visa06cu:4218: svalpavṛttā sunepathyā vikhyātā sā vilāsikā // VisSd_6.302 //
GK16visa06cu:4250: hallīśa eka evāṅkaḥ saptāṣṭau daśa vā striyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4261: upanyāso 'tha vinyāso vibodhaḥ sādhvasaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.309 //
GK16visa06cu:4265: bhrāntināśo vibodhaḥ syānmithyākhyānaṃ tu sādhvasam // VisSd_6.311 //
GK16visa06cu:4271: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ nāṭakaprakṛtitve 'pi yathaicityaṃ yathālābhaṃ nāṭakoktaviśeṣaparigrahaḥ
GK16visa06cu:4272: yatra ca nāṭakoktasyāpi punarupādānaṃ tatra tatsadbhāvasya niyamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4287: taduktavastuno yacca punarupādānaṃ nāṭakāntara iti bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:4296: dvābhyāṃ tu yugmakaṃ sāṃdānatikaṃ tribhiriṣyate // VisSd_6.314 //
GK16visa06cu:4302: “sāndrānandamanantamavyayamajaṃ yadyogino 'pi kṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkartumupāsate prati muhurdhyānaikatānāḥ param /
GK16visa06cu:4307: sākṣātkatudhyānaikatānā dhyānamātrāviṣṭā yoginaḥ pratimuhurupāsate tadbrahma yā mathurāpurayuvatayaḥ kautukādāliṅgantītyādi tā dhanyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4316: he kānte ! karopānte imāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ kimarthaṃ karoṣi ? tataḥ praṇayapravaṇa ityādi spaṣṭam
GK16visa06cu:4317: kuraṅgākṣīmiti vaktuṃ vayaṃ yāvadīhāmahe tāvanmadhuro madhupadhvaniḥ cūte āvirabhūt /
GK16visa06cu:4318: atra prathamaślokārtho dvitīyaśloka utkikarmatvena ukta iti ekavākyatā /
GK16visa06cu:4322: sargabandho mahākāvyaṃ tatraiko nāyakaḥ suraḥ // VisSd_6.315 //
GK16visa06cu:4324: ekavaṃśabhavā bhūpāḥ kulajā bahavo 'pi vā // VisSd_6.316 //
GK16visa06cu:4326: aṅgāni sarve 'pi rasāḥ sarve nāṭakasandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.317 //
GK16visa06cu:4334: catvārastasya vargāḥ syusteṣvekaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.318 //
GK16visa06cu:4336: kvacinnindā khalādīnāṃ satāṃ ca guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.319 //
GK16visa06cu:4338: nāstisvalpā nātidīrghāḥ sargā aṣṭādhikā iha // VisSd_6.320 //
GK16visa06cu:4340: sargānte bhāvisargasya kathāyāḥ sūcanaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.321 //
GK16visa06cu:4346: kavervṛttasya vā nāmnā nāyakasyetarasya vā // VisSd_6.324 //
GK16visa06cu:4349: (vi, ṇa) catvāra iti---dharmārthakāmamokṣā ye catvāro vargāsteṣvekamapi tatphalamityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:4352: sāṅgopāṅga iti---amī sāndhyāsūryendvādayaḥ putrajanmāntā iha kāvye yathāyogaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sāṅgopāṅgā varṇanīyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4358: sargopādeyeti---sarge upādeyā varṇitā yā kathā tayā sarganāmetyarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:4364: (vi, ta) bahuvacanamavivakṣitamiti---avasāna ekasyāpi anyavṛttikasya dṛṣṭa tvāt /
GK16visa06cu:4377: śiṣyaṃ prati guruṇāmākhyānaśāstrakathane yāḥ saṃjñā adhyāyarūpāstādṛśasaṃjñakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4407: vṛttagandhojjitaṃ gadyaṃ muktakaṃ vṛttagandhi ca // VisSd_6.330 //
GK16visa06cu:4423: atra “kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍa'--ityanuṣṭubvṛttasya pādaḥ, “samarakaṇḍūla” iti ca prathamākṣaradvayarihitastasyaiva pādaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4430: bhujadaṇḍe kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍasya śiñjinyāḥ guṇasya ṭaṅkāreṇa ujjagaritaṃ vairinagaraṃ yena
GK16visa06cu:4436: aniśaṃ viṣamānāṃ niśitānāṃ śarāṇaṃ visareṇa--pātena vidalitāḥ parighāḥ mudrarāḥ gadāśca yatra tādṛśaṃ parabalaṃ yasmāt, he tādṛśetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4437: guṇaratnasāgaretyādi---atra rephāntaṃ nāma dvayaṃ nāntañca sambodhanadvayamalpasamāsakam /
GK16visa06cu:4438: kathāyāṃ sarasaṃ vastu gadyaireva vinimitam // VisSd_6.332 //
GK16visa06cu:4448: asyāmanyakavīnāṃ ca vṛttaṃ padyaṃ kvacitkvacit // VisSd_6.334 //
GK16visa06cu:4459: āryeti--āryādicchandasāṃ madhye yena kenacicchandasā āśvasasya mukheādau anyāpadeśena--anyacchalena bhāvyarthasya vakṣyamāṇārthasya sūcanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4462: iti daṇḍyācāryavacanāt kecit ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” ityāhuḥ,
GK16visa06cu:4469: (vi, ra) “ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” iti yad kenaciduktaṃ tad
GK16visa06cu:4495: iti sāhityadarpaṇo dṛśyaśravyakāvyanirūpaṇo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ /
